originalText.text: I went here on December 30th, my hair was black and I wanted blonde. To my understanding the owner was doing my hair and she did not explained at any moment that my hair could break this bad. One side of my head is compeletely damaged I had to cut my hair twice after getting my hair dyed here. Unbelievable

originalText.text: Ligia is very arrogant and heavy, she speaks to you very badly and with attitude, when I was there my appointment was at 12:00pm I was booked this appointment one month in advance because I don‚Äôt live in the city, she came late, I asked her over conversation in WhatsApp if she can do a color in my hair and she guaranteed she can do in my hair the picture I sent. Before she start the process I‚Äôm asked about the price and she said I can‚Äôt tell you know, in the middle of the process I‚Äôm asked again and she don‚Äôt tell me nothing I had to ask 3 times the last time when I asked she said very arrogant I can‚Äôt tell you the price with customer in front, for me was annoying because every customer is different she supposed to tell me before because she don‚Äôt know what was my budget, long story short, she charged me $ 550 dollars  without listening what I really want, now I have to put a color in my hair. Let me know in case you want a see pictures about your worse job.
